name: Dolphin Kids Racing - Dolphin Fish Racing For Kids
name_original: Dolphin Kids Racing - Dolphin Fish Racing For Kids
description:
One of the Most Unique Kids Racing game on AppStore!

Ride on the back of your favourite Dolphin!!

You must use all of your Racing and dodging skills to reach the end of the Race . You’ll need quick reactions and nifty fingers, as there are many opposition players trying to take you down.Think you can dodge your way to the End Zone? Good,get ready, and let’s get running!

Game Features
- Incredible physics engine that provides realistic-looking vehicle
- Unique ,Easy and smooth gameplay
*Many Levels With Stunning 3 Dimensional Graphics
* Intelligent Missions To Give You A Tough Competition. * Crazy Addictive Experience.
* Smooth And Easy Game Play
* Environments That Keeps Changing
* Real Animations And Physics
publishers: Al Khawarizmi Software Development and Services
